issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: This issue has been validated/reproduced, but has not been prioritized yet.
status.name: Confirmed

fields.description:
A cloud formation template with an invalid rule:

{code}
{
  "AWSTemplateFormatVersion": "2010-09-09",
  "Description": "Security group test stack",
  "Resources": {
    "group": {
      "Type": "AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup",
      "Properties": {
        "GroupDescription": "Test group."
      }
    },
    "ingress": {
      "Type": "AWS::EC2::SecurityGroupIngress",
      "Properties": {
        "GroupId": {
          "Fn::GetAtt": [
            "group",
            "GroupId"
          ]
        },
        "IpProtocol": "tcp",
        "FromPort": "10000",
        "ToPort": "10000"
      },
      "DependsOn": "group"
    }
  }
}
{code}

can be created, but not deleted:

{code}
#
# euform-create-stack --template-file group-stack-delete-fail.json group-stack-delete-fail-1
arn:aws:cloudformation::137406357550:stack/group-stack-delete-fail-1/6bcad1ca-2b47-4646-b235-3088e9c24246
# 
# 
# euform-describe-stacks group-stack-delete-fail-1
STACK	group-stack-delete-fail-1	CREATE_COMPLETE	Complete!	Security group test stack	2015-07-06T23:23:05.190Z
# 
# 
# euform-delete-stack group-stack-delete-fail-1
# 
# 
# euform-describe-stacks group-stack-delete-fail-1
STACK	group-stack-delete-fail-1	DELETE_IN_PROGRESS	User Initiated	Security group test stack	2015-07-06T23:23:05.190Z
# 
# 
# euform-describe-stacks group-stack-delete-fail-1
STACK	group-stack-delete-fail-1	DELETE_FAILED	The following resource(s) failed to delete: [ingress].	Security group test stack	2015-07-06T23:23:05.190Z
# 
# 
# euform-describe-stack-events group-stack-delete-fail-1
EVENT	group-stack-delete-fail-1	71b0a235-6dbe-487a-ae0f-a3b3c893d55e	AWS::CloudFormation::Stack	group-stack-delete-fail-1	arn:aws:cloudformation::137406357550:stack/group-stack-delete-fail-1/6bcad1ca-2b47-4646-b235-3088e9c24246	2015-07-06T23:24:32.393Z	DELETE_FAILED	The following resource(s) failed to delete: [ingress].
EVENT	group-stack-delete-fail-1	group-DELETE_COMPLETE-1436225071621	AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup	group	group-stack-delete-fail-1-group-2N8XG759DFFFI	2015-07-06T23:24:31.621Z	DELETE_COMPLETE	
EVENT	group-stack-delete-fail-1	group-DELETE_IN_PROGRESS-1436225069514	AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup	group	group-stack-delete-fail-1-group-2N8XG759DFFFI	2015-07-06T23:24:29.514Z	DELETE_IN_PROGRESS	
EVENT	group-stack-delete-fail-1	ingress-DELETE_FAILED-1436225068745	AWS::EC2::SecurityGroupIngress	ingress	ingress	2015-07-06T23:24:28.745Z	DELETE_FAILED	Invalid Ip Permissions:  must specify either a source cidr or user
EVENT	group-stack-delete-fail-1	ingress-DELETE_IN_PROGRESS-1436225008144	AWS::EC2::SecurityGroupIngress	ingress	ingress	2015-07-06T23:23:28.144Z	DELETE_IN_PROGRESS	
EVENT	group-stack-delete-fail-1	f0087f29-cbc3-4b11-a3b7-bb230bec306b	AWS::CloudFormation::Stack	group-stack-delete-fail-1	arn:aws:cloudformation::137406357550:stack/group-stack-delete-fail-1/6bcad1ca-2b47-4646-b235-3088e9c24246	2015-07-06T23:23:27.405Z	DELETE_IN_PROGRESS	User Initiated
EVENT	group-stack-delete-fail-1	896bef05-f9c5-4fac-abef-afd766b07377	AWS::CloudFormation::Stack	group-stack-delete-fail-1	arn:aws:cloudformation::137406357550:stack/group-stack-delete-fail-1/6bcad1ca-2b47-4646-b235-3088e9c24246	2015-07-06T23:23:13.245Z	CREATE_COMPLETE	Complete!
EVENT	group-stack-delete-fail-1	ingress-CREATE_COMPLETE-1436224992464	AWS::EC2::SecurityGroupIngress	ingress	ingress	2015-07-06T23:23:12.464Z	CREATE_COMPLETE

EVENT	group-stack-delete-fail-1	ingress-CREATE_IN_PROGRESS-1436224991404	AWS::EC2::SecurityGroupIngress	ingress		2015-07-06T23:23:11.404Z	CREATE_IN_PROGRESS	
EVENT	group-stack-delete-fail-1	group-CREATE_COMPLETE-1436224990654	AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup	group	group-stack-delete-fail-1-group-2N8XG759DFFFI	2015-07-06T23:23:10.654Z	CREATE_COMPLETE	
EVENT	group-stack-delete-fail-1	group-CREATE_IN_PROGRESS-1436224990261	AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup	group	group-stack-delete-fail-1-group-2N8XG759DFFFI	2015-07-06T23:23:10.261Z	CREATE_IN_PROGRESS

EVENT	group-stack-delete-fail-1	59a7061d-bf13-4719-849a-e4f072e09306	AWS::CloudFormation::Stack	group-stack-delete-fail-1	arn:aws:cloudformation::137406357550:stack/group-stack-delete-fail-1/6bcad1ca-2b47-4646-b235-3088e9c24246	2015-07-06T23:23:05.587Z	CREATE_IN_PROGRESS	User Initiated
#
#
{code}

Once the security group is manually deleted the stack can be deleted.
fields.summary: CloudFormation error deleting stack with invalid security group rule
